x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Search Not Working For some Tables
Search feature is not working for some tables. If you search anything on List view under For text or any column the result returns No records, even if the matching records are present in the table
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Search Not Working For some Tables
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Raise a HI Ticket with ServiceNow as this is a ServiceNow OOB Functionality
x_nuvo_diag_probes.script:
var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
util.handleOutput('If search is not working on a particular table, a Hi Ticket is Needed with ServiceNow. Search is a ServiceNow OOB Functionality even on Nuvolo tables.','warning', 'ServiceNow');
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Search Not Working For some Tables

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_1c7ca498db4159105f598b050596196f
